EmailTemplate.name: 201809_BK_Event_KingAir_Flight_Demo_MC.201809_BK_Event_KingAir_Flight_Demo_MC.20
EmailTemplate.subject: SCHEDULE TODAY: BendixKing AeroVue Flight Demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> <[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
For a limited time, receive a FREE AeroWave™ system with an AeroVue upgrade!
AeroWave <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerowave-100]]> is a satellite communications system that allows you, your co-pilot and your passengers to send text messages, browse the web, send email and make phone calls. AeroVue offers:
- Connect to in-flight weather worldwide
- Unlimited data and affordable voice calls
- Stay connected to family, friends, and business associates
- Certified for your King Air B200 (and 41 other Part 23 aircraft)
Now is your chance to fly the BendixKing AeroVue Integrated Flight Deck <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue]]>! Sign up for the one-hour flight demo today and experience the state of the art glass cockpit for your B200.
SIGN UP NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AeroVue_Flight_Demo.html]]>
